body_html: I’m not sure if we will want this. You can just build your own dockerfile on top of what we provide, but adding a new one for every other program people use with PyTorch would result in explosion in the number of dockerfiles we need. Thanks for the proposal!

body: I’m not sure if we will want this. You can just build your own dockerfile on top of what we provide, but adding a new one for every other program people use with PyTorch would result in explosion in the number of dockerfiles we need. Thanks for the proposal!
